body.p: When you clone a cloud VM, a copy of the instance for the cloud VM is created and associated with the new cloud VM.
Perform the following steps to clone a cloud VM:

li.p: Click a cloud profile in the OCI group.
The cloud VMs for the selected cloud profile are displayed.
Right-click the cloud VM you want to clone and select Clone.
The Clone Name dialog is displayed.
Enter a name for the clone.
The name you enter is also used as the display name for the related instance. The default name for the clone consists of the _clone suffix appended to the original name. For example, ol9-dev_clone.
Click OK to create the clone and the related instance. The new instance is started automatically.
The new cloud VM is shown in the OCI group in .
